name: Pongish!
description:
This is the first game I would consider I've actually completed. I'm posting this roughly a year and a half after I made this little guy. I really enjoyed creating every bit of this game, and I really hope you enjoy giving this little twist on an old classic a go :)

Local co-op or play by yourself! Keep that ball goin' and see what happens ;)

Left Paddle: WASD

Right Paddle: ◄▲►▼

Have fun, and thank you so much for playing!
